definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Beckenham or Beckham (name)/David Beckham (1975-), British midfield footballer
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. to 貝克|贝克[bei4 ke4]

sentences.english: I think David and Victoria Beckham are a perfect match.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲戴維貝克漢夫婦真是天生一對。

sentences.english: Holmes and I had been sharing room in Baker Street for some years.
sentences.chinese: 我和福爾摩斯已經在貝克街共居多年了。
“進攻，”哈塞爾貝克說“我們一定能更好。”

sentences.english: In fact, the first found to be a man named Henri Becquerel.
sentences.chinese: 其實，最早發現是一個名叫貝克勒爾的人。

sentences.english: The ball he put over at the start of the second half at Hull was like Beckham in his prime.
sentences.chinese: 對赫爾城下半場剛開始他射進的入球像極了貝克漢姆。

sentences.english: Mr. Brown, Mr. Baker is defaulted , you will this walkover match.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生，由於貝克先生棄權了，你不戰而勝。

sentences.english: And that’s just because he’s married to a Spice Girl.
sentences.chinese: 他們知道貝克漢姆，也僅僅是由於他娶了辣妹。

sentences.english: These feelings are all embodiments of Steinbeck's land complex.
sentences.chinese: 這種情緒就是斯坦貝克的土地情結的體現。

sentences.english: Steinbeck wrote furiously and said that the effort nearly destroyed him.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦貝克憤怒地寫，並說寫作幾乎毀了他。

sentences.english: I only like Dave Brubeck with this quartet , and the drummer is what is driving him.
sentences.chinese: 我只喜歡戴夫布魯貝克此四方，和鼓手正是推動他。

sentences.english: A serious low for Beckham was at the 1998 World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 貝克漢姆的最低谷是在1998年的世界盃。

sentences.english: Malbec really is one of the relatively unknown gems of the Chilean climate.
sentences.chinese: 馬貝克稱得上是智利無名的寶石。

sentences.english: The polygamous organization of families is a focus of Becker’s book.
sentences.chinese: 貝克爾著作的關注之一就是家庭的多偶制結構。

sentences.english: Backham Earns 47000 Pounds a Day Accounts Reveal.
sentences.chinese: 帳目顯示貝克漢姆日入47000英磅。

sentences.english: Some of the best material here is Beckett's dyspeptic book talk.
sentences.chinese: 此卷最好看的地方是貝克特對某些書的惡評。

sentences.english: I can write that in, Mr . Baker .
sentences.chinese: 我可以把它寫進去，貝克先生。

definition: Russell (name)/Bertrand Arthur William, 3rd Earl Russell (1872-1970), British logician, rationalist philosopher and pacifist
Rhone, river of Switzerland and France
Arnold (name)/refers to Arnold Schwarzenegger 阿諾·施瓦辛格|阿诺·施瓦辛格[A1 nuo4 · Shi1 wa3 xin1 ge2]
